parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering arm can cause the vehicle to become undrivable, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The steering arm breaks off from the ball joint

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature wear on steer tires can lead to reduced traction, increased stopping distance, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: improper combination of race/bearings in Meritor axles.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Drag Link and Tie Rod Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the drag link and tie rod can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
Unsecured loads on trailers can cause debris to fall off and hit other vehicles, potentially causing accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Debris from unsecured loads on trailers
such as metal or canvas signs
can fall off and hit other vehicles
